comment: It said no technology and you posted a technology question to Science. Also you are clearly stupid and have nothing worthwhile to contribute. Sorry not sorry. Bye!
amr:
# ::snt It said no technology and you posted a technology question to Science. Also you are clearly stupid and have nothing worthwhile to contribute. Sorry not sorry. Bye!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / say-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / it)
                  :ARG1 (t / technology
                        :polarity -))
            :op2 (p / post-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (q / question-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / technology))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / science)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s3 / stupid
                  :domain (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1-of (c / clear-06))
            :op2 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (n / nothing
                        :ARG1-of (w / worthwhile-03)
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / contribute-01
                              :ARG0 y2)))
            :mod (a3 / also))
      :snt3 (s4 / sorry-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
            :snt4-of m)
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 ii2
      :snt5 (b / bye))
